title: Feel like royalty in our luxurious 2 BR / 2 BA! Call today!
posting_body: ['Apex at 290', '290 E Main St', 'Elmsford, NY 10523', '(914) 595-2526', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 2 BA - 1086 sq ft', 'Per Month:', '$3565 - $4091', 'Lease Length:', '3-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'Say hello to your new home at Apex 290!', 'Our apartments near White Plains, NY, offer some of the most luxurious apartment and community amenities that you can find!', "From an updated fitness center with CrossFit training equipment to quartz countertops in every unit, you'll look forward to coming home to your own little piece of heaven at Apex 290!", 'Take a look through our photo gallery and see why your next chapter should start at Apex 290!', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'Features and Amenities:', '♥ Eco-Friendly Community', '♥ Furnished Units Available', '♥ Nearby Municipal Bus Stop', '♥ Package Concierge', '♥ Pet Play Area', '♥ Pet Washing Station', '♥ Picnic Area', '♥ Roof Terrace', '♥ Smoke-Free', '♥ Video Patrol', '♥ 3,000 sq.', 'ft. Rooftop Deck with Grilling Stations', '♥ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '♥ Community Park- Elevated Views', '♥ Eco-Friendly Community 4,600 sq.', 'ft. Landscaped Community Park with Shade Trees', '♥ Elevator Access to All Floors', '♥ Game Room with Billiards, Ping Pong, and Arcade Games', '♥ Nearby Starbucks Just Steps Away', '♥ Option Between Uncovered Parking and Covered Parking with Elevator Access', '♥ Personal, Oversized Storage Rooms Available', '♥ Renters Insurance Program', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'This Unit Comes With:', '♥ Double Vanities', '♥ Fireplace', '♥ Framed Mirrors', '♥ Full-size, Side-by-Side Washer & Dryer', '♥ Furnished Apartment Available*', '♥ Hardwood Floors', '♥ Ice Maker', '♥ Patio', '♥ Range', '♥ Storage Units', '♥ A Breakfast Bar, and Quartz Countertops', '♥ Artfully Designed Bathrooms with Double Vanity Sinks and Custom Finishes', '♥ Central Heating and Cooling', '♥ Full-Size Walk-in Closets', '♥ Full-size, Side-by-Side Washer & Dryer', '♥ Furnished Apartment Available*', '♥ Gourmet Kitchen with State-of-the-Art Appliances', '♥ SOUTH FACING', '♥ Spacious Light-Filled Layouts with High Ceilings and Expansive Windows', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'Call us for more information!', '-- (914) 595-2526 --', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pets:', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed: We have a $500 pet fee per pet and $65 rent per pet each month.', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1CAA13EB64AB47']
